citeinfo.origin: University of Alaska Anchorage for Chugach National Forest, Alaska Natural Heritage Program
citeinfo.title: Copper River Delta Community Classification Field Plots

descript.abstract: Data Type: Vegetation/Land Cover/Soils; The database consists plot information collected in 1993-94 by The Alaska Natural Heritage program under a cooperative agreement with the Chugach National Forest to develop a hierarchical classification of community types, describe the successional plant community sequences, and landcover associations for the Copper River Delta. Plot information was collected by trained field crews and georeferenced to 1:63,360 and 1:60,000 CIR air photos. 286 plots were used to create the classification. These data points reside in a paradox database format. The intended use of these data were used to develop and support the community type classification for the area for use by the U.S. Forest Service. These data have not been put in a GIS system but are GIS ready.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
